ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(StageName), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Formalization"), OR( ISBLANK( Valor_Proposta__c ), NOT( NdaAnexado__c ), NOT(PropostaAnexada__c) ) )
